channel.title: Need help with delta

item.title: Need help with delta
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[size=14pt]Solved![/size]
needed to apply in client class to

Hi, So I was adding some npcs for slayer in my npchandler.java
but only the first npc of my code works.
I can attack the other npcs even when i don’t have the right level, and I don’t get xp or a message.

This is my code:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1648 && temp.playerLevel[18] >= 1) {
temp.addSkillXP(150, 18);
temp.sM("You have gained some slayer experience.");
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1600 && temp.playerLevel[18] >= 10) {
temp.addSkillXP(180, 18);
temp.sM("You have gained some slayer experience.");
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 90 && temp.playerLevel[18] >= 18) {
temp.addSkillXP(210, 18);
temp.sM("You have gained some slayer experience.");
}

Any one know where the problem is?

Read full topic
